data.name: Star Survivor Demo
data.detailed_description:
One vs Thousands


You are the last ship, survive the endless swarm with every overpowered weapon and upgrade the fleet has to offer.

Join The Discord


Discuss builds, talk strategies, and suggest new features and weapons with fellow captains.

Unique Builds Every Run


In this rogue-lite survival asteroids game, select from a variety of weapons and upgrades to create unique and overpowered builds every run. Carefully control your ship with Newtonian physics past the swarm of thousands of enemies. Each kill will gain you resources to upgrade your vessel, unlock new ships, or stack the odds in your favor.

Select Your Ship


Choose from a selection of ships that offer a variety of unique gameplay experiences and equipment synergies.

Stack The Deck


Turn the odds in your favor. Unlock new cards each run, purchase, and add new cards to your deck that is drawn when you level up in combat. Upgrade them to increase your power and customize your upgrade deck for strategic builds. A fun twist to the randomness of rogue-lites.

data.short_description: The last ship against the endless. Exterminate as many as you can, gather points to upgrade your ship, and stack the deck in your favor. Will your choices be enough to overcome the thousands that are hunting you? Survive the swarm in this rogue-lite + survivors + asteroids mashup.
